resources.string: Our Player Perks App was designed to enhance your experience while visiting any of our more than 40 locations.
Earn points and drawing entries just for playing at Dotty’s, Shelby’s and Stella’s locations.
The more you play the more you earn.
Redeem points the way you want.
Points can be redeemed for incentives and other rewards, either through the app or on premise.
Receive notifications for contests, special events, promotions and other incentives only available through Player Perks.
